ygData.subject: Re: Making coin at level 10
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i have to disagree about killing in guk right now, because you will be hated at higher levels when you wish to return to lower guk, when you really hope to
ygData.messageBody:
>Subject: Re: Making coin at level 10

>For real fun, find Innothule Swamp in the SW corner, hang a left and
>follow the coast, and enter upper Guk. Kill a lot of frogloks, and
>you should come out with a nice collection of woven armor. (I've been in
>Guk for hours and found not a thing, then found 3 woven gloves in a row.)
>Take the woven to Qeynos where there are lots of
>monks and higher demand for the stuff. Sell any gloves you find for
>as much as you can, O' 8pp or more. I made 60 pp with a few packfulls from
>Guk to Qeynos, and that was with people telling me
>my prices were more than fair.

i have to disagree about killing in guk right now, because you will be hated
at higher levels when you wish to return to lower guk, when you really hope
to go to guk. blackburrow, paw, and misty thicket are all the places id
suggest to go to get exp and money.
